fields.name: BEACON_EFFECTS
javadoc: List of effects that Beacons can apply

fields.name: beamSections
javadoc: A list of beam segments for this beacon

fields.name: name
javadoc: The custom name for this beacon. This was unused until 1.14 see https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-124395

fields.name: primaryPower
javadoc: Primary potion effect given by this beacon

fields.name: secondaryPower
javadoc: Secondary potion effect given by this beacon.

methods.name: getUpdatePacket
javadoc: Retrieves packet to send to the client whenever this Tile Entity is resynced via World.notifyBlockUpdate. For modded TE's, this packet comes back to you clientside in {@link #onDataPacket}

methods.name: getUpdateTag
javadoc: Get an NBT compound to sync to the client with SPacketChunkData, used for initial loading of the chunk or when many blocks change at once. This compound comes back to you clientside in {@link handleUpdateTag}

methods.name: setCustomName
javadoc: Sets the custom name for this beacon.
